description: Browse and search decisions published on Greece’s Diavgeia transparency portal. Filter results by multiple criteria to find relevant acts fast. Retrieve full details for a specific decision using its ADA identifier.

tools.name: get-decision
tools.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific government decision using its ADA (unique identifier). Returns comprehensive decision metadata including subject, protocol number, issue date, organization, signers, and PDF content when available.

ada.description: The ADA (unique identifier) of the government decision. This is a required parameter to retrieve detailed information about a specific decision.

tools.name: search-decisions
tools.description: Search for government decisions in the Diavgeia transparency platform based on various criteria including keywords, organizations, decision types, and date ranges. Returns a list of matching decisions with their metadata.

q.description: Main search query keyword (e.g., 'education', 'health', 'economy'). This is the primary search term for finding relevant government decisions.

page.description: Page number for pagination (starts from 0, default: 0)

type.description: Decision type identifier (e.g., 'Β.1.1' for appointments, 'Β.2.1' for budgets)

to_date.description: End date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Accepts natural language dates like 'today', 'December 2024' and converts them to ISO 8601 format for searching Diavgeia decisions.

from_date.description: Start date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Accepts natural language dates like 'last year', 'this year', 'January 2024' and converts them to ISO 8601 format for searching Diavgeia decisions.

ministryIdOrName.description: Organization ID or name - will be automatically detected from ministry name if not provided. Use organization context to find valid IDs.
